__e: It can't be. It's as if Superman moved to Gotham City.
I don't expect the people of Gotham City to forgive my crimes overnight I only ask that they give me a second chance.
But what does a town that was wiped out by floods three years ago... have to do with the children that have gone missing in Gotham?
Gotham needs a hero with a face.
Gotham needs men like you. Both of you.
No, Gotham needs its true hero... and I let that murdering psychopath blow him half to hell.
